game.name: Epic Car Factory
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Epic Car Factory puts you in the drivers seat of your very own car company. Build, market, hire, fire, and more in this fast paced business simulation. The failure and success of the company depends entirely on your decisions and how you react to the ever changing market place.
